products.title: Amor Vibrant Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

products.title: Burst Champagn Pink Vertical Blind
products.description: A gorgeous off-white tone with just the ever so slightest pink tinge, like a bottle of pink champagne, you will find that this blind is the perfect way to balance darkly coloured environments and give a strong contrast that doesn't overwhelm. Illuminated from behind you will get a warm white glow with the softest rose tint that floods the room with a slightly romantic vibe. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash rosewood pink vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant fabric with a beautiful pink hue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This stylish pink vertical blind brightens any room. Vertical blinds add a stylish, modern look and this light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this bright pink vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This soft bella blackout rosewood pink vertical blind brings warm-toned splash of rose pink to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a touch of vigour to a dim window with the origin (blackout) in flamingo. This supple blind has a smooth feel and neatly hanging louvres that can be tilted or moved according to how much light you want to let into the room. Make the flamingo stand out by placing in a white bathroom or kitchen, with only colour-coordinated accessories to accent the deep pink colour. Or use in a child's bedroom, amongst baby pinks, soft whites, and contemporary florals.
